about_the_game:
This free tackle pack is dedicated to our wonderful community of anglers! Get two unique baitcasting rods and two baitcasting reels, available in three color variations each, as well as three swimbait lures and three spoon lures. Thank you for your support and passion!

Classic Tackle Pack includes:

1 Wright Whippet Rod
1 Wright Lurcher Reel
1 Perk'n'Kins Gilgamesh Rod
1 Perk'n'Kins Nebuchadnezzar Reel
3 swimbait lures: Sizes 6, 3, and 1/0
3 spoon lures: Sizes 6, 3, and 1/0

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler™ - Classic Tackle Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit OS - Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 (4C / 4T) (Q3 ‘15) or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4 GB or AMD RX 480 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit OS - Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD Vega 56 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: This free tackle pack is dedicated to our wonderful community of anglers! Get 2 unique baitcasting rods and 2 baitcasting reels, available in 3 color variations each, as well as 3 swimbait lures and 3 spoon lures. Thank you for your support and passion!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
